mods.abstract: View of Cairo, Mosque of Mohammed Ali in the background at Cairo; hand colored print of view of Cairo; buildings in various states of disrepair (fore to middle ground); Mosque of Mohammed Ali and possibly Mosque-Madrassa of Sultan Hasan in the background; "LE CAIRE. Vue panoramique. Lichtenstern et Harari, Cairo" in gold along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

mods.note: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Louis Bailey Audigier, McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture, The University of Tennessee. 1934.1.31.51
